line: what are we keeping thanksgiving a secret this year
no we are playing this game i learned at work
you have to name all the states in six minutes
now that is a lot harder than it sounds
you always forget at least one or in some cases
it is a stupid game and i was not playing against other people so technically i did not lose
oh that is not bad pheebs
oh i got tired of naming states
so i decided to list the types of celery and i have one regular celery
okay so rachels got 48 and phoebe has the lead in vegetables joey
say hello to the new champ of chandlers dumb states game
wow how many have you got
how is new england not a state
does south oregon have a sports team
how come we have one extra place setting
but tags not coming his girlfriend came into town so he is spending thanksgiving with her
why did not you tell me
i made him his own individual sweet potato stuffed pumpkin
well i was going to but then i figured you know
your food is so delicious and perfect you can never have too many of those pumpkin things
now you think i would not enjoy that because it is so fake but i still do
oooh that may be a new worlds record
you know i hate to lecture you guys but it is kinda disgraceful that a group of well educated adults and joey cannot name all the states
did you ever see a map or one of those round colorful things called a globe
who is well educated now mr
all right out of oven space
do not let joey eat any of the food
no just give me another minute
look ross if you do not know them by now you will never know them okay
that is the beauty of this game
it makes you want to kill yourself
all right uhh i bet i can get all 50 before dinner
okay but if you cannot no dinner
do not look at my list ross because there is a lot on there that you do not have
hey did you guys know that your oven does not work
but the drawer full of take out menus is okay right
can you give me a hand
sure and joey do not let ross look at any of the maps or the globe in your apartment
do not worry chandler it is not a globe of the united states
hey you guys gonna go out and take a walk
phoebe why is your bag moving
what the hell is in there
it is just my knitting that is all
how come we do not hang out here more often
maybe it is because it smells a little weird
it is like old pumpkins or something
we left joey alone with the food
phoebe why is there a dog in our apartment
phoebe there is a dog sitting on my couch
tell her allergic and i will sue
no there is no dog here
he is black and white and shaggy and he is sitting next to rachel and licking rachels hand
i uh wanted to see if your offer to spend thanksgiving with you is still good
well what what happened to your girlfriend
we kinda broke up this morning
yeah so she went back to ohio
there there is no dog here
there is no dog in here
phoebe we can hear the dog barking
no that is just me coughing
listen um i have a dog in my room
well watching it for some friends who went out of town
may i please stay with you nice people
oooh i wish she could stay here but chandler is allergic
if anywhere near a dog for more than 5 minutes my throat will just close up
that is odd because this dogs been living here for the past 3 days
chandler if that dogs been here that long and you have not had a reaction maybe you are not allergic to this dog
well it still has to go right
are you out of your mind
they are needy they are jumpy and you cannot tell what they are thinking and that scares me a little bit
ahh she just ate a treat out of my hand
do you not like all dogs
look chandler i told you never tell anyone about this dog thing
it is like ross not likin’ ice cream
you do not like ice cream
okay it is just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable
and i do not wanna say this i do not want you guys to hate me but uh i do not think i can be around that dog anymore
okay so either the dog goes or i go
how can i not get this
a college professor i got 1450 on my s
damn i forgot you were here
we are gonna take clunkers to ross’s
we will be back in a minute
oh wait before you guys go can i just ask you a question
when a guy breaks up with his girlfriend what is an appropriate amount of time to wait before you make a move
when it is your assistant i would say never
all right rach the big question is does he like you
because if he does not like you this is all a moo point
yeah it is like a cows opinion
have i been living with him for too long or did that all just make sense
please do not listen to joey okay
he is away from his family he is spending thanksgiving with strangers
what he needs right now is for you to be his friend
okay that is what gonna do
no one ever listens to me
when the package is this pretty no one cares what is inside
so were you guys together a long time
i kinda thought we had end up together
now that she broke up with you
i always used to assume that i would meet someone and fall in love and be happy and all that was just a given
but lately it is like what if it is not
do you ever have that feeling
no yeah all the time constantly
but you know that i figure it it has to work out
you have all the answers do not you
hey thanks for talking to me
well what is a boss for
all right he likes you back
told ya you should go for it
street noise drowned any of that out
no all right i see you later okay
uh yeah well see he joey knows that very insecure about my back and and you are hugging me so obviously you are not repulsed by it yeah
wait wait a minute that does not make any sense
all right heres the truth um joey said what he said because um attracted to you

i have a crush on you and uh and and i know that is crazy because we work together and and nothing could ever happen and the last thing i want to do is is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable
which is why it would be really great if you said something right about now
those guys are stealing my car
okay that is gonna take them a minute
do you have anything else you wanna get off your chest
wait we still have time to talk and they’re they are not even in the car yet
oh look there they go okay
okay phoebe we should probably go back now
please do not leave me be lonely
you know if you want we can sneak the dog back in and chandler would not even know
had that dog there for three days and chandler had no idea
yeah but you kinda knew that something was going on did not you
what is she doing back here
she is not made of ice cream
i uh i laid out the states geographically
no no we do not really have time for this right now
okay we have to keep chandler away from my bedroom
see this is exactly what we do not have time for
she is very upset about this whole clunkers thing
well i i should go in there
she does not want to see you right now
because you sent away the dog
look when monica and i were kids we had a dog named rover
and uh one day my dad decides he does not like dogs
so monica and her friend phyllis take away the dog
and that was the last time we ever saw him
only with a few details changed
monicas all upset because i sent clunkers away
bring the dog back you are a hero
yeah i can be a hero i could do that
i w w what if what if it attacks me
chandler it is like a big gerbil
and that does not scare you
dude you cannot just make stuff up
when i finish this game i swear i am moving
tags still talking to the police
why damnit why did i open my mouth
i have a crush on you i am attracted to you
gee i i know that i freaked him out
if you said it like that you probably did yeah
no no he went for a walk
okay but you cannot tell him
oh no no no no no no no
he went over to ross to bring the dog back here
oh no the dogs not going to be there
please please please do not be mad at me
maybe we will maybe we will not
okay i went over to ross apartment to bring back clunkers
y’know for you and i left the door open and she must have gotten out and i looked everywhere all over the apartment including the roof which fyi ross one of your neighbors growing weed
i could not find him and i am so so so sorry
but i do know where we could all go ease the pain
we have good news look who is back
that is right she came back all by herself
it is so good to see you
yeah she came all the way back from ross building
oh the things she must have seen
and then she climbed up the fire escape and she tapped on the window with her teeny little paw and then we ran to let her in i went too far did not i
okay maybe this is so hard because there are not 50 states
let me tell you something i have 49 states and there are no more
i i think i should be able to eat something
i gotta go down to the police station and look at mug shots
thanks for having me over you guys
uh we did not uh we did not get the chance to talk
uh so where did you say you are from again
look um i think we should talk about what happened on the terrace
ah i i never should have said what i said
it just does not matter how i feel
i mean we work together so nothing could really ever happen between us and what i would love is just to go to work on monday and and never talk about this again okay
big day monday lots to do
oh god i knew it that i freaked you out
the only thing that freaked me out was you saying that nothing could ever happen between us
yeah so please do not fire me for doing this
okay well that is one less thing we have to do on monday
